stimulus:
In this experiment, you will be presented with 8 scenarios, which you must read carefully.

After reading each scenario, you will be prompted two comprehension questions: a multiple choice question and a brief open answer question. You will be required to answer both questions for every scenario, meaning 16 questions in total.

To begin the experiment, hit the space bar.

response.Explanation: the omg adds more excitement and sincerity to the response. the exclamation marks makes it seem like she is being sincere
although is making a comparison to lifting a cow, it doesn't make her response sarcastic, but shows her passion.
jack knows hes a terrible cook, so the fact she said it was perfect, would suggest to jack that she is joking. Also the aren/t you so sweet is a bit patronising.
it is honest and truthful as margaret does not like dogs. Julia knows that not everyone likes dogs.

Although philip scoffed, eric doesn't know it was because of the jacket. Also as he just sent a kind gesture to phillip, he would expect something sincere in return, not a sarcastic comment as that is rude.
he had a heated argument in front of david. david knows they've had a sensitive argument and would be able to see that jeremy is being sarcastic.

Although Ana genuinely thinks james is a good person, other people such as ken clearly does not know this, otherwise he wouldnt have asked. Also they had a very dramatic fight so people clearly think they are not on good terms because of that.
I think she would interpret it as sincere, but knows that something happened during it, as the response is quite brief and short.
